featured.text: Higher ocean temperatures kill the important food source for the coral—the algae, the tiny greenish-gold water plants that live on coral.
When the algae die, the coral loses its color and it also dies 38 .
Their diet consists mainly of sponge and algae.

definition.zh_def: 藻類是一種水生植物，通常是單細胞或多細胞的，能進行光合作用，並在水體中生長。
definition.en_def: Algae are aquatic organisms, typically unicellular or multicellular, that perform photosynthesis and grow in water bodies.
definition.example: The pond was covered with green algae during the summer.
